name: Working days
description: The API returns the number of days,  hours, working days, working hours, wages, weekend days, and the list of public holidays of the requested date period and country. You can also add any number of working days or working hours to a given date. 50 countries and over 230 regional calendars are supported and we work hard to keep our database up to date by following government announcements regarding public holidays changes. All the calendars can be fully customized from our friendly working da...

api_methods.name: /1.3/list_non_working_days
api_methods.description: List the non working days (weekend days, public holidays and custom dates) between two dates in chronlogical order.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me all the non-working days in Germany between December 20, 2024 and January 5, 2025?
List the weekends and public holidays in Japan for the month of April 2024.
I need to know which days are considered non-working in Canada from July 1st to July 15th, 2024, using the 'Federal holidays' configuration.
Show me the list of public holidays and weekends in the United Kingdom between May 1 and May 31, 2024.
Which days are non-working in India from August 10th to August 20th, 2024?
Give me all the non-working days in France for the first two weeks of September 2024.
Could you provide the list of weekends and holidays in Australia from December 24, 2024 to January 2, 2025?
Tell me which days are non-working in Brazil during the Carnival period, from February 9 to February 14, 2024.
I want to see all the non-working days in Singapore for the entire month of October 2024.
Identify the non-working days in South Africa between March 15 and March 31, 2024.

api_methods.name: /1.3/add_working_days
api_methods.description: Add (or remove) any number of working days to a date.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: increment
parameters.description: The number of working days you want to add to your start date (positive or negative integer but not zero)

parameters.name: include_start
parameters.description: Should the count include the start_date? Default value is true. If you set include_start to false ("false" or "0"), the count will start at the next working day (or previous working day, if increment is negative)

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: If I start a project in Germany on 2024-07-01, when will it finish after 15 working days, not counting the first day?
Add 7 working days to August 15, 2024 in Canada using the Ontario regional calendar.
I need to know the date 20 working days before March 10, 2025 in the United Kingdom, excluding the start date.
Tell me the deadline if I add 12 working days to September 5, 2024 in Australia, using the New South Wales calendar.
If I remove 5 working days from December 24, 2024 in the United States, what date do I get?
Could you calculate the date 30 working days after January 2, 2025 in India, including the start date?
Let me know the result if I add 3 working days to April 10, 2024 in France, using the Paris configuration.
I want to find out what day it will be 10 working days after October 1, 2024 in Japan.
Please subtract 8 working days from May 20, 2024 in Brazil, using the São Paulo calendar.
If I start my leave on November 18, 2024 in South Africa, when will I return after 14 working days, not counting the first day?
